checkItem.name: SSL (HTTPS) for all web servers. (Do NOT NEED 3rd party signed cert, self signed is ok)
Responsive Websites for the front end
**Deployment System** ------> Must package files from the development server and automatically install it/roll back to QA or Prod servers - **Due on the 19th**

data.text:
Some notes regarding the deployment server:

DO NOT MAKE THE ENTIRE SERVER A SINGLE PACKAGE
SMALL RELATED CONTAINED CHANGES per package
No two packages should own the same file / resource

USE: Python / BASH / PHP
USE: RabbitMQ, MySQL

scp to move files around
tar to create packages
ini/json/xml to configure them


**The logic consists of**:
- createPackage authentication
- read authentication.ini -> create authentication.v2.targz
- scp authentication.v2.targz -> deployment server
- installPackage authentication v2 QA_frontend
- send RMQ -> QA FE
- SCP authentication.v2.targz ./
- tar -xzvf authentication.v2.targz
- read authentication.ini
- DO STUFF
- Done

*Example files that may be in package*:
var/www/authentication.html
var/www/auth.php
var/www/auth.css
